concept.title: Recipe Section for Suggested Flavors
concept.shortdesc: For this section you will find 3 flavors that are highly recommended by the Hokie ice cream enthusiasts. There is one suggestion for each type, (Ice Cream, Gelato, & Sorbet) to make your decision on what to make easier and more fun! Use the kitchen at the end of the room to find the ingredients. 2 of the recipes will require access to the stove, which is also located in the kitchen area.
